original_text: For the Lord will not cast off his people, neither will he forsake his inheritance.
korean_text: 여호와께서는 자기 백성을 버리지 아니하시며 자기의 소유를 외면하지 아니하시리로다

sentences.original_text: For the Lord will not cast off his people
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 자기 백성을 버리지 아니하실 것이며

sentences.original_text: neither will he forsake his inheritance
